text: @kaitlancollins Sounds to me the virus is discriminating enough to stay away fr a nasty, evil-infected man?BUT that’s not how COVID-19 rolls. I’ll bet Trump has the virus 🦠& is keeping it from us , much like Kim Jong Un . Dictators do not give a glimpse into their weakness. Let that sink in .
